languages.text: Святая Терра, имеющая первостепенное значение в Империуме, классифицируется как A0. Марс и ряд других миров-кузен — как A1, поскольку они менее приоритетны, чем столица. Как и ранг десятины, эстимаре-рейтинг планеты может меняться с течением времени.

traits.locale_text:
Святая Терра, имеющая первостепенное значение в Империуме, классифицируется как A0. Марс и ряд других миров-кузниц — как A1, поскольку они менее приоритетны, чем столица.
Как и ранг десятины, эстимаре-рейтинг планеты может меняться с течением времени.

languages.text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.
languages.original_text: Святая Терра, имеющая первостепенное значение в Империуме, классифицируется как A0. Марс и ряд других миров-кузен — как A1, поскольку они менее приоритетны, чем столица. Как и ранг десятины, эстимаре-рейтинг планеты может меняться с течением времени.

traits.locale_text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other Forge Worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like a planet's Tithe Grade, its Aestimare rating may also change over time.

Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other Forge Worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like a planet's Tithe Grade, its Aestimare rating may also change over time.

Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other Forge Worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its Tithe Grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other Forge Worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its Tithe Grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

languages.text: Das Heilige Terra in seiner enormen Wichtigkeit für das Imperium, hat die Kategorie A0. Mars und einige Fabrikwelten sind A1 und haben eine geringere Priorität als die Hauptwelt. Die Aestimare-Wertung eines Planeten kann sich wie sein Zehntgrad mit der Zeit ändern.
languages.original_text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

traits.locale_text: Das Heilige Terra in seiner enormen Wichtigkeit für das Imperium, hat die Kategorie A0. Mars und einige Fabrikwelten sind A1 und haben eine geringere Priorität als die Hauptwelt. Die Aestimare-Wertung eines Planeten kann sich wie sein Zehntgrad mit der Zeit ändern.

languages.text: La Sainte Terra, étant la plus importante des planètes pour l'Imperium, appartient à la catégorie A0. Mars et plusieurs autres mondes forges font partie du groupe A1, du fait de leur priorité inférieure à celle de la capitale. Comme le niveau de dîme, la classification Aestimare d'une planète peut changer au fil du temps.
languages.original_text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

traits.locale_text: La Sainte Terra, étant la plus importante des planètes pour l'Imperium, appartient à la catégorie A0. Mars et plusieurs autres mondes forges font partie du groupe A1, du fait de leur priorité inférieure à celle de la capitale. Comme le niveau de dîme, la classification Aestimare d'une planète peut changer au fil du temps.

languages.text: 神圣泰拉是帝国的核心，世界价值评级为A0级。火星与其他部分铸造世界优先级略低于神圣泰拉，世界价值评级为A1级。与什一税级类似，某颗行星的世界价值评级也会随着时间推移而不断变化。
languages.original_text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

traits.locale_text: 神圣泰拉是帝国的核心，世界价值评级为A0级。火星与其他部分铸造世界优先级略低于神圣泰拉，世界价值评级为A1级。与什一税级类似，某颗行星的世界价值评级也会随着时间推移而不断变化。

languages.text: Sagrada Terra, por su importancia máxima para el Imperium, tiene la categoría A0. Marte y otros mundos forja son A1, lo que supone una prioridad inferior a la capital. Al igual que su grado de diezmo, el aestimare de un planeta también puede cambiar con el tiempo.
languages.original_text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

traits.locale_text: Sagrada Terra, por su importancia máxima para el Imperium, tiene la categoría A0. Marte y otros mundos forja son A1, lo que supone una prioridad inferior a la capital. Al igual que su grado de diezmo, el aestimare de un planeta también puede cambiar con el tiempo.

languages.text: 聖なる地球は帝国にとって最も重要であり、A0に分類されている。火星やその他の複数の工業惑星は首都よりも優先度が低く、A1に分類されている。惑星のアエスティマーレ等級は、その租税等級と同様に、時間の経過とともに変動することもある。
languages.original_text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

traits.locale_text: 聖なる地球は帝国にとって最も重要であり、A0に分類されている。火星やその他の複数の工業惑星は首都よりも優先度が低く、A1に分類されている。惑星のアエスティマーレ等級は、その租税等級と同様に、時間の経過とともに変動することもある。

languages.text: İmparatorluk'ta birincil öneme sahip Kutsal Terra, A0 olarak kategorilendirilir. Mars ve bir dizi diğer döküm dünyaları, A1 kategorisindedir ve başdünyaya kıyasla öncelikleri düşüktür. Tıpkı aşar derecesi gibi bir gezegenin Değerlendirme derecesi de zamanla değişebilir.
languages.original_text: Holy Terra, being of prime importance to the Imperium, is categorised as A0. Mars and a number of other forge worlds are A1, having lower priority than the capital. Like its tithe grade, a planet's Aestimare rating may also change over time.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk'ta birincil öneme sahip Kutsal Terra, A0 olarak kategorilendirilir. Mars ve bir dizi diğer döküm dünyaları, A1 kategorisindedir ve başdünyaya kıyasla öncelikleri düşüktür. Tıpkı aşar derecesi gibi bir gezegenin Değerlendirme derecesi de zamanla değişebilir.
